page.title: 03CHURCHES
page.content: The{parish church}is dedicated to{St. {Michael and All Angels .} A newly ordained non-stipendiary curate was appointed in 1985,associated with Eastgate and Stanhope, and with the Rector of Stanhope in charge. About 20-30 attend regularly. Every month there is a{joint service}with the Methodists, and also monthly, a joint service is held for the four parishes at one of the churches. The{Parish Council}organises fund-raising-a summer fayre and a Christmas bazaar, whist and domino drives and an organ fund. The{Parish Hall}has two large rooms, and is hired out regularly as a craft shop, and for local functions. A{Methodist Chapel}at Bridge End has an average attendance of 15-20. One minister covers Lower Weardale. The Sunday School closed in 1985.
